name: asynchronously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not at the same time or speed: You can watch the video and view the comments in real time, or you can play the video to the end and then read the comments asynchronously. There was a problem that caused the audio to run asynchronously with the film, so the characters' speech didn't align with the movement of their lips.
More examplesFewer examplesThe client and server operate asynchronously, communicating in separate and distinct messages like in an email correspondence.The data is processed asynchronously so as to keep the workflow at a steady balance.The story is told asynchronously, with the author alternating between the events surrounding the unsolved murder and the discovery of new clues twenty years later.
